pkgmetadata.longdescription: Canonical Correlation for Survey Data // Performs canonical correlation for survey data, including multiple tests of significance for secondary canonical correlations. A key feature of this package is that it incorporates survey data structure directly in a novel test of significance via a sequence of simple linear regression models on the canonical variates. See reference - Cruz-Cano, Cohen, and Mead-Morse (2024) "Canonical Correlation Analysis of Survey data: the SurveyCC R package" The R Journal under review.
